name: Centour MVP
notes:
First attempt will use Django, HTMX, Tailwind, and Alpine. All for speed. Django so that we can later build an API on the same database. It will all start web based. I have found a TestDriven course on all this which will give me a good start.

Made loads of progress on this, I have a tracer bullet setup and deployed (almost) that we can iterate on.

name: Mobile App
notes: Auth0 precludes the use of Expo Go. This means I have to use development builds. I therefore cannot use iPhone because I don’t have a Mac. I’m going to do all on android, seriously debating getting a Galaxy. Starting with emulator but will swap to device when I’m home next week.

name: Continuum Rewrite
notes: As part of improving Continuum I’m replacing a lot of the bad and messy code with clear, well written, simplified, tested alternatives. The actual functionality will be the same, it’ll be thoughts and tasks, organised by tags and dates.

name: Model Squid
notes: Kemi wants to swap the Rigel flow for Ganymede. Neither train nor WT have the Ganymede configs so I’ve pushed a custom WT in my sandbox, tried a new squid but that failed. Apparently Sam fixed it, need to revisit and rerun. Have done that, it’s running now. It succeeded, but kemi tried it and there was a platform error. I’ve been asked to release a new model squid trained on 10m, there is a chat setup for everyone to make progress on this. I’m using the same pipeline config but overriding the clearML dataset. That pipeline is currently training.

name: Gitlab Token
notes:
Outage caused by expired token. Need to change how docker image works so that it refreshes token when it runs. Current have proposed an idea based on entry point when the the script runs, fetch updated value from SecretsManager.
Changed that idea after feedback from Guy, we’re now mounting the secret with a secrets provider directly into the needed location. This hinges on the fact that pip config is all that’s needed.

name: Centour Limnats
notes: Speak to Julia about using Centour with Limnats.

name: Rate Limiting Part 2
notes: More rate limiting observed possibly from the sim this time. I’m going to a bit of digging into this. So I had a Quick Look at the sim, nothing obvious, made a recommendation to remove one API call. Also we’ve turned down the request rate in the config again.

name: Baseline Datasets
notes: Goal is to organise them in ClearML and docs. I went through everything in Kemis list and moved them into the baselines project. I updated the names, and updated tags. I deduplicated, using the updated tool. I updated the updater tool with the task IDs. I’ve updated the confluence docs. Kemi is reviewing, I saw she has some more datasets to add. Have added those now. Updated and produced more comprehensive documentation for the team to find and update dataset baselines. It’s in review with the team.  Team reviewed and are happy. I’ve made an announcement to the team, the docs are now shared. Any feedback or updates I’ll amend but I consider this complete for dataset baselines. The next task is to update the model baselines.
